author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Microbix Biosystems Posts Q2 Revenue Of C$3.0 Million
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Microbix Biosystems Inc:
* MICROBIX REPORTS RECORD SECOND QUARTER SALES * Q2 REVENUE C$3.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
